name: Cult of Darkness
defeated: O Mighty Blasphemian where are you
introduction: Dont try to stop us or Darkness shall consume thy kingdom
hateLetsHearIt: In which way you are gonna waste my time now?!
I hope this time you will worth it
hateNo: Go away before Darkness kills you

afterPeace: We shall not be as merciful as we are now
tradeRequest: Darkness honored you with this, be glad about it
